body_html:
I think in one of the posts on GitHub, @mrry mentioned that StagingArea is no longer being worked on and that it is to be directly integrated to Dataset API. Can anyone confirm this ?
The code for High Performance Models is written without any comments and description. A cleanup of it would actually resolve most of these use-case scenarios.

body:
I think in one of the posts on GitHub, @mrry mentioned that StagingArea is no longer being worked on and that it is to be directly integrated to Dataset API. Can anyone confirm this ?
The code for High Performance Models is written without any comments and description. A cleanup of it would actually resolve most of these use-case scenarios.
